lead_paragraph: If the Carolina Panthers had their way, maybe Peyton Manning would be playing for them — not against them — in the Super Bowl.

headline.print_headline: Peyton Manning a Panther? Carolina Tried, but Failed in '98
headline.main: Peyton Manning a Panther? Carolina Tried, but Failed in '98

snippet: If the Carolina Panthers had their way, maybe Peyton Manning would be playing for them — not against them — in the Super Bowl....
